en.web: Web developer from Buenos Aires, Argentina
en.name: Aaron Cuellar
en.p-inicio: Passionate about technology, science and knowledge.
en.description-carrer: Degree offered by FCEN - UBA. So far I have acquired knowledge about algorithms, data structures, algorithmic complexities, program specification, low-level computer operation, as well as mathematical and theoretical foundations related to computing. In addition to technical knowledge, I have strengthened skills such as teamwork, efficient time management and perseverance.
en.description-ingles: Elementary English training provided by the Faculty of Exact and Natural Sciences of the University of Buenos Aires. This course reinforces basic skills in reading comprehension, writing and oral communication.
en.description-pc: Training and practices on repair, maintenance, hardware and software installation. It included diagnosis of problems, computer assembly and system optimization, developing essential skills for technical support and customer service.
en.description-colegio: Secondary education with a focus on Economics, which included training in administration, accounting and basic economic principles, strengthening skills such as organization and creativity.
en.text-about-me-1: Hello! How are you? Let me tell you a little about myself. I am 21 years old and I live in Buenos Aires, Argentina. I am currently studying the degree in Computer Science, while at the same time I am training as a web developer.
en.text-about-me-2: My objetive is to become a fullstack professional. I enjoy every new learning and deeply value the support of this incredible community. I am a person who loves to face new challenges and who feels prepared to add value to the technology industry.üë®‚Äçüíºüíª
en.text-contact: Do not hesitate to contact me by writing to any of my social networks or sending me an email. I hope to connect with you and explore opportunities together! üìûüöÄ
